pesticide.PPE: Long-sleeved shirt and long pants; Chemical-resistant gloves, made of any waterproof material including polyethylene or polyvinyl chloride; Shoes plus socks.

Safety_Information.general_Info: CAUTION: Causes moderate eye irritation. Avoid contact with eyes, or clothing. Wash thoroughly with soap and water after handling and before eating, drinking, chewing gum, using tobacco or using the toilet.
Safety_Information.if_In_Eyes: Hold eye open and rinse slowly and gently with water for 15 - 20 minutes. Remove contact lenses, if present, after the first five minutes, then continue rinsing. Call a poison control center or doctor for treatment advice.
Safety_Information.physician_Note: Have the product container or label with you when calling a poison control center or doctor, or going for treatment.

Application_Info.max_applications_per_season: 3 at the lowest use rate, 1 at the highest use rate
